title: There should be at least one water tap and arrangement for drainage in the vicinity of each water-closet or group of waterclosets in all the buildings
clause_text: There should be at least one water tap and arrangement for drainage in the vicinity of each water-closet or group of waterclosets in all the buildings.
section: 12.5 WATER SUPPLY, DRAINAGE AND SANITARY REQUIREMENTS

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
